@mk2's public utilities for Egg, Inc.

What's new

  • CoopTracker
  • Loot simulator
  • Enlightenment companion

Hosted at independent domains

  • — Coop tracker and contract master list

Hosted at this domain

Interactive apps

  • Artifact explorer — Explorer for everything artifacts
  • Artifact sandbox — Experiment, optimize, and share your artifact builds all within this sandbox
  • Rockets tracker — Tracker for active rocket missions, historical mission statistics, progress on artifact collection, etc.
  • Past contracts viewer — Past contracts and prophecy egg completion tracker
  • Loot simulator — Simulator for mission loot drops
  • Enlightenment companion — Informational companion on your journey to the Enlightenment Diamond Trophy

Data sheets

  • Artifact list
  • Mission list
  • Consumption sheet — Artifact consumption outcomes
  • Loot analysis — Statistical analysis of mission rewards data through interactive plots
  • Events calendar — Filterable calendar of (not so) special events.

Developer tools

  • Researches — Structured data of common and epic researches, customizable by SQL.

Certain tools are not advertised here due to concerns. If you are interested, poke around the source directory to find them.

Self-hosted

  • EggContractor — contract monitoring web app & CLI client

All tools above are open source.
